items.sentence: Tom reminds me of myself when I was his age.
I\'m pretty sure Tom hasn\'t been to Boston.
Tom and Mary plan to get married in October.
I don\'t have a clear idea of what you mean.
I don\'t have the time to do that right now.
I\'m almost finished with what I have to do.
I\'m going to do whatever I can to help Tom.
I\'m going to study French for one semester.
I\'m going to travel to Boston this weekend.
Tom couldn\'t do anything about the problem.
Tom couldn\'t find words to express himself.
I think Tom isn\'t going to do that, either.
I think that Tom doesn\'t understand French.
How did Tom and Mary get to know each other?
How did Tom get Mary to cook dinner for him?
How did Tom know what Mary was going to say?
How did Tom know what he was supposed to do?
Why do I have to come up with all the ideas?
Why do you always ask me the same questions?
Did Tom ever tell you what Mary looked like?
